short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your attendance viewing experience and determine how many days you need to attend ;)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Attendance-Bot! This powerful tool is designed to make tracking your attendance and taking planned study leaves at school a breeze.

Simply install the extension and log in to your SAP portal account. Attendance-Bot will automatically retrieve your attendance data, perform the necessary operations and display all the information right there on the website. Attendance-Bot is a must-have tool for students, employees, and anyone else who needs to keep track of their attendance. 

Install Attendance-Bot today and take the hassle out of attendance tracking !
